item.title: What am I doing with HUGO
item.description: I am trying to create a personal web page on GitHub using Hugo static site generator. A few links which I have been using for this: Getting Started with HUGO

item.title: Why HUGO?
item.description: Why am I trying out HUGO static website generator? A lot of articles on the web mentions that HUGO is the fastest static site generator available today. 7 REASONS WHY HUGO IS AWESOME Also, it seem well suited to implement a free web site via GitHUB. Jekyll is the most on for GitHub Pages, but comes across as unnecessarily complicated for simple blogs or demo sites. GitHub Pages are powered by Jekyll behind the scenes, so theyâ€™re a great way to host your Jekyll-powered website for free.
